group_1.narration: Toor rul lol loo@Gammon and spinnage
The frog he wouldn't,@and high cockolorum.
Toor rul lol loo@Toor rul lol loo

group_1.textRight: Good morning, Homura!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:200301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Y-yes! I'm fine, thank you!

group_1.textRight: Uh...you're fine?

group_1.textLeft: P-p-please pay me no mind! [chara:200301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200301:motion_1][chara:200301:cheek_1][chara:200301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:200301:lipSynch_1]Ehehe...

group_1.textCenter: (Oh no! How is it already time for lunch?!)
(If I give her the chocolate during class @it might just get in her way...)
(Plus, if our teacher noticed we'd get in @trouble...)
(Yes, the best time to give the chocolate to@her is during lunch!)

group_1.textRight: Ma-Madoka! Um... I want to tell you@something!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Homura!
Can you make it to the party today?
I'm so excited that I couldn't help myself,@so I bought a whole bunch of ingredients!

group_1.textRight: Y-yes! I'm very excited as well!
But, before then...
Err, no, it's nothing!
Later! Later would be better!
I'll give it to you at Mami's party!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, okay...?
Then, let's go to Mami's together after@school!

group_1.textRight: Yes!

group_1.narration: That was so nerve-wracking...@But I was able to promise to give it to her!
All that's left is passing them out...
I can give everyone their chocolate at@Mami's house, so there's no need to worry.
Maybe I should've just given it to her during@lunch...
She might think I forgot about@Valentine's Day...

group_1.textLeft: Hey Homura! I need to stop by the teacher's @office for a few minutes.
Would you wait for me outside?

group_1.textRight: Of course!

group_1.textCenter: (I wonder if Jane Doe has already given @her chocolates.)
(Now that things here have settled down,@I'm more worried about her.)

group_1.textLeft: Hello? How'd it go? Did you already...
Hello?
Jane Doe? Where are you? Hello?

group_1.textRight: Homura... Homura.
I didn't...have anyone else to call...
Sorry for bothering you. Sorry.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:200301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
(Sounds like she's in a hospital...)
You're at that hospital, right?! I'll be@right there!
Wait right there for me! I promise, I'll be@right there!

group_1.textRight: *Pant* *Pant* [chara:200300:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:200300:cheek_1][chara:200300:face_mtn_ex_031.exp.json][chara:200300:lipSynch_1]Jane...

group_1.textLeft: Homura...

group_1.textRight: Is that blood?! [chara:200300:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200300:cheek_0][chara:200300:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:200300:lipSynch_1]Are you hurt?!

group_1.textLeft: No. It's not mine. I'm fine.
I got so angry...
I couldn't deal with all the bullying like @I usually do...
I just couldn't today. I couldn't...
Their timing was so bad...

group_1.textRight: (Her Soul Gem, it's so tainted!)
A-anyway, let's get you purified right away!

group_1.textLeft: Homura, it seems as though I was never@meant to amount to anything after all.
I thought I was needed by someone, but I was@wrong.
I just thought I was.
Even after becoming a Magical Girl... Even@after joining the Wings of the Magius...
I've amounted to nothing at all.
Back when we first met in this very place,@I'd engaged a Witch in combat...
My only intention was to save an@acquaintance of mine, the head nurse.
The idea of protecting everyone never@occurred to me.
If I could just secretly save that nurse,@that would be enough.
I thought, "Maybe I can at least do@that..."
That's why I could never be the hero of any@story.

group_1.textRight: (Is it too late?! I'm out of Grief Seeds...)

group_1.textLeft: Homura... I'm sorry... I'm sorry...
Homura, Homura... I like you.
I like you so much.
I love everyone. I love everything.
So, please, give me something! Anything!
Why don't I have anything at all?!

group_1.textRight: Please calm down! Everything's going@to be okay!
I want a chocolate from you too! I'd be so@happy to get one!
Because I found the perfect chocolate just@for you, too!
Don't say you don't have anything!
It's okay! You're going to be just fine!@Calm down!
Your Soul Gem is nearly...
Let's find another Magical Girl! [chara:200300:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200300:eyeClose_0][chara:200300:motion_200][chara:200300:lipSynch_1]Maybe@someone has a Grief Seed!

group_1.textLeft: There aren't any Magical Girls around.@They've all gone to Kamihama.
Even if there were, none would share a @Grief Seed...
Something they risked their life to obtain.
I couldn't become more like you.
I...wasn't able to amount to anything.
I was overjoyed the day I could leave@this hospital and go back to school again.
But I was happiest here, this was the last@place I was ever happy...
There was nothing for me anywhere else.
That day when I made my wish to Kyubey...
I should've wished to become the star @of the story.

group_1.textRight: Don't give up hope!
It's okay! I'll figure out what to do!@Take my hand!
I'm right here, by your side!
Please tell me why you're crying!
Let me hear more about you!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry.
I...I'm not a main character. There is@nothing worth knowing about me...
My story just doesn't exist anywhere.
Sorry, Homura.
I just, I...
